column6: "reviewText": "One of the best games of all time.You get the thrill of beating all the bosses

column6: "reviewText": "The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time may be difficult at times for some of the temples were designed to make you think but this game is the best game I have ever played in my entire life.I have been playing nintendo for years and I have played some of the older Zelda games before but I never owned any
column7: as soon as I tried this game - I immediately loved it and I've played it millions and millions of times.  I am so obsessed with it
column8: I went out and pre-ordered the Wind Waker to get the Zelda bonus disc and renewed my subscription twice to Nintendo Power to get the Zelda Collector's Edition disc.There is no need for me to review this game - all I really need to say is buy it.  You will not be disappointed (if you are a nintendo fan or have a brain).  Definitely be sure to get the follow up Majora's Mask and the Wind Waker.  A must play and Link is the best hero ever."
column10: "summary": "By far the best Zelda game ever"

column6: "reviewText": "Go out and buy it and play it yourself and see what I mean ok. The level's are great and there is alot to do. One in the Deku Tree and One in Goron City and One in the Zora's Domain. Some time in the game you will be older
column7: by the time you look around the place will be dead.You as Link and you have to save the world form evil form the evil king name Ganondori and his evil plan's before it's too late. And save a beautiful princess name Zelda. And you get to meet other characters in the game too some are cool some are big and some are small.Buy the (The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of time Official Strategy Guide) it's a big help to me and you if you with it.Everything Revealed to YOU.PS. I know everything in the game do you. I PLAY IT AND I LOVE IT."
column9: "summary": "Zelda Ocarina of time.  What a great game."

column6: "reviewText": "If you have an N64 you absolutely should have this game. It's a remake of the classic Zelda game from the good old NES and SNES systems with some added twists

Not just the good old "Ocarina of Time
column9: but also an enhanced version called "Master Quest." Make sure to put both into your shopping cart and enter the correct code while checking out to capitalize on this great value.Happy Hunting."

column7: this game was part of the Zelda collector's edition. I didn't know much about Zelda
column8: and had only played very few games before
column9: but was mesmerized by this game. The beginning of it is so magical and imaginative; it really draws you in to the story. I found myself playing through the beginning of it over and over again because I didn't have my memory card yet. This game takes place in a vivid fantasy world that is vibrant
column12: and haunting. I had never experienced anything like it. To this day I have never been so absorbed by another game.What's really impressive is that this whole game is very consistent. The music is also exceptional. The music is better than most movie soundtracks
column13: in my opinion. All of it perfectly accompanies what is happening in the game. So much happens in this game; it has a lot of cinematic scenes too
column15: which is an excellent tale of good versus evil.Ocarina of Time stimulated my imagination at a young age more than just about anything I know of. There are a few films and books that would come close
column16: but I can't think of anything that could quite surpass it. Ocarina of Time is an involving
column19: and epic adventure. Playing it for the first time makes for an unparalleled experience."

column6: "reviewText": "There comes a point when sooner or later one has to admit that they have reached a mile stone. This is it. Look no further than the game that changes everything that went before it. Yes
column7: certainly other games can compete graphically with this
column8: but innovation is an entirely different proposition. Zelda
column10: innovates on an unparalleled scale. Weather
column13: all real aspects which merely touch the surface of this monumentous achievement.To be really honest
column14: there is no real weakness with this game. No puzzle will stop you in your tracks. There is ALWAYS something to do. In fact it will take you a lot longer to find everything the game has to offer than it would to finish other games. And this is where the distinction comes in. You can label this as an adventure game if you like. But
column15: it is beyond comparison with everything else. Thus meaning that it should be catagorised in a genre by itself. Or at least as a game that redefines an entire genre.There are no comparisons. Forget other inferior games that try and emulate and 'better' this. Forget the games that rely on pretty visuals to impress. Zelda has all these and so
